text: Hewlett - Packard agreed to buy EYP Mission Critical Facilities, a data center engineering firm, for an undisclosed sum in a deal that will provide an exit for TA Associates.  The Boston private equity firm invested $57.5 million in EYP Mission Critical in 2001.  The target ’ s officials said at the time its post - money valuation was about $120 million.
title: Hewlett - Packard Engineers Deal for EYP.
